FuncDef:
The radius-server algorithm command sets the algorithm of a RADIUS server.
The undo radius-server algorithm command restores the default setting.
By default, the RADIUS server adopts the active/standby algorithm.

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates the active/standby algorithm. Only the RADIUS authentication server or accounting server configured first is the active server.
-

Indicates the load-sharing algorithm. The weight of the RADIUS authentication server or accounting server takes effect only after loading-share is used.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The radius-server algorithm command takes effect only for all authentication servers and accounting serves in a specified RADIUS server.
When the active/standby algorithm is used, the second configured RADIUS server becomes the master server if the master RADIUS server is deleted.
The number of authentication servers and accounting servers supported by a RADIUS server group is less than 32.
